sentences.en: A review with 44 references is given on the developments and applications of low temperature phosphorescence.
sentences.cn: 本文综述了44篇文献,介绍低温磷光的发展概况及其应用.

sentences.en: Besides this, Javert possessed in his eye the feline phosphorescence of night birds.
sentences.cn: 况且沙威的眼睛有着夜鸟那种象猫一样的磷光。

sentences.en: Bits of phosphorescence swirled in the foam.
sentences.cn: 飞沫起处,还闪现出点点磷光.

sentences.en: Crystal habit, luster, color, streak, cleavage, fracture, fluorescence, phosphorescence, specific gravity and magnetism.
sentences.cn: 晶体习性、光泽、颜色、条痕、解理、裂理、荧光、磷光、比重和磁性。

sentences.en: He saw the phosphorescence of the Gulf weed in the water ( Ernest Hemingway )
sentences.cn: 他看见水中马尾藻属海草发出的磷光 ( 欧内斯特海明威 )

sentences.en: He saw the phosphorescence of the Gulf weed in the water.
sentences.cn: 他看见马尾藻在水中发出的磷光.

sentences.en: It was the yellow Gulf weed that had made so much phosphorescence in the night.
sentences.cn: 正是这种黄色的果囊马尾藻在夜间发出很强的磷光.

sentences.en: The paper introduces the long after glow phosphorescence material and its applications in ceramics process.
sentences.cn: 介绍了长余辉发光材料以及这种材料在陶瓷工艺中的应用.

sentences.en: The physical properties and the luminescence ( fluorescence and phosphorescence ) of fluorite are discussed in the paper.
sentences.cn: 论述了萤石的物理性质及其发光性 ( 荧光和磷光 ).

sentences.en: They sank leaving a trail of phosphorescence in the water.
sentences.cn: 它们沉下去时,在水中拖着一道磷光.

sentences.en: Whilst all the landscape was in neutral shade his companion's face, which was the focus of his eyes, rising above the mist stratum, seemed to have a sort of phosphorescence upon it.
sentences.cn: 当所有的景物都沐浴在明暗相宜的色调中的时候，他的同伴的脸就成了他眼睛注意的中心，那张脸从层层雾霭中显露出来，脸上似乎染上了一层磷光。

words.tran_cn: [昆] 发出磷光的；磷光性的

trans.tran_en: a slight steady light that can only be noticed in the dark
